channel.title: Service on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Service on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Service
item.description: I have been a PC member for conferences such as: CIKM 2017 CIKM 2018 ADCS 2018 SIGIR 2019 I have been a reviewer for conferences and journals such as: ADCS 2016 SIGIR 2016 ADCS 2017 SIGIR 2017 VLDB 2017 The Journal of Information Science I was the proceedings chair for WSDM 2019.
